articles.author: John Power, Erin Hale
articles.title: Trump moves to deport Indian pro-Palestinian Georgetown University student - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Badar Khan Suri detained by US Department of Homeland Security after being designated for removal.
articles.content: An Indian postdoctoral researcher at Georgetown University who has spoken out against Israels war in Gaza is facing deportation after being detained under United States President Donald Trumps immigr… [+4436 chars]
